Abstract: Rev R Scott Colglazier of University Christian Church in Fort Worth, Tex, appeals to colleagues around country to dedicate their first sermons of new year to subject of peace (M)
Snippet: Rev R Scott Colglazier of University Christian Church in Fort Worth, Tex, appeals to colleagues around country to dedicate their first sermons of new year to subject of peace (M)
LeadParagraph: Several months ago a Fort Worth committee charged with planning the city's millennial events decided that this New Year's Eve ought to be more than just a party, and instead offer people a chance to reflect on something of greater meaning.

Headline.Main: Religion Journal; Fort Worth Saw a Way to Set This Holiday Apart
Headline.PrintHeadline: Religion Journal; Fort Worth Saw a Way to Set This Holiday Apart
